summary.description: novel computational framework for systematic uncovering hidden gene interactions underlying known drug-disease associations | A computational framework for uncovering hidden gene interactions underlying Known Drug-Disease Associations (KDDAs) | To use KDDANet, please refer to the instructions in manual.txt in this subdirectory | This software identifies the hidden gene interactions and modules underlying KDDAs through implementing minimum cost optimization and graph clustering on a unified flow network model
summary.name: KDDANet
